Content:
Need to some advice.
I only just recently noticed that my engine makes a hissing sound when I shut it off.
Somebody suggest that it was pressure being released from the petrol tank but I am doubtful.

I started the bike from cold and did not give it enough time to warm up, then shut it off and I can still hear a hissing sound.
No idea if it is compressed air or a vacumme hiss.

Anybody experience this before?
Title: 1982 GS550E engine hissing sound
Author: adventure@730203
